name: jsonair-project-14.9
description: Week 8 Project - Back End

scripts.resetDatabase: node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/dropAirportsTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/dropAirlinesTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createAirlinesTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createAirportsTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateAirlinesTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateAirportsTable.js
scripts.startDatabase: node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createAirlinesTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/createAirportsTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateAirlinesTable.js && node -r dotenv/config ./db/scripts/populateAirportsTable.js
